com.cleo.lexicom.external

Class SystemInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cleo.lexicom.external.SystemInfo

  • public class SystemInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    SystemInfo is used to set additional system information during permanent licensing. Refer to ILicenser.licenseQuery(SystemInfo).
